downloadTitle: Impact of Controlled Language on Machine-Translation Quality and Post-Editing Efforts
downloadDescription: Results from experiments conducted by Microsoft Research’s Machine Translation Incubation Team to investigate the impact of using good English (controlled language) on post-editing productivity—as well as on the overall quality of our statistical machine-translation system. Last published: September 5, 2007.
detailsSection: Results from experiments conducted by Microsoft Research’s Machine Translation Incubation Team to investigate the impact of using good English (controlled language) on post-editing productivity—as well as on the overall quality of our statistical machine-translation system.
